Detailed Description

Add intersection functions.

<glm/gtx/intersect.hpp> need to be included to use these functionalities.

Function Documentation

Compute the intersection of a line and a sphere. From GLM_GTX_intersect extension

Definition at line 192 of file intersect.inl.

References glm::dot(), glm::epsilon(), glm::normalize(), and glm::sqrt().

00198         {
00199                 typename genType::value_type Epsilon = std::numeric_limits<typename genType::value_type>::epsilon();
00200                 genType dir = normalize(point1 - point0);
00201                 genType diff = sphereCenter - point0;
00202                 typename genType::value_type t0 = dot(diff, dir);
00203                 typename genType::value_type dSquared = dot(diff, diff) - t0 * t0;
00204                 if( dSquared > sphereRadius * sphereRadius )
00205                 {
00206                         return false;
00207                 }
00208                 typename genType::value_type t1 = sqrt( sphereRadius * sphereRadius - dSquared );
00209                 if( t0 < t1 + Epsilon )
00210                         t1 = -t1;
00211                 intersectionPoint1 = point0 + dir * (t0 - t1);
00212                 intersectionNormal1 = (intersectionPoint1 - sphereCenter) / sphereRadius;
00213                 intersectionPoint2 = point0 + dir * (t0 + t1);
00214                 intersectionNormal2 = (intersectionPoint2 - sphereCenter) / sphereRadius;
00215                 return true;
00216         }
